name: Edwin Sulaiman
description:
I'm an Indonesian software developer that works in Jakarta. Has knowledge in leading a group of mobile developers and helping teams from multiple divisions create outstanding apps. Working with motivated and upbeat individuals is something I enjoy.

Problem-solver, self-starter, and organized person with great attention to detail. Online gaming enthusiast, outdoor enthusiast, and J-POP fan.

I adore creating backend applications, although I work as a professional mobile developer right now.
